name: Bouncy Balls
description:
This is a silly prank game to scare your friends.

Control the red ball with the mouse. The game constantly spawns blue balls to bounce around the screen, dodge them as long as you can, otherwise you lose.

Losing after around 10 balls being spawned makes a fullscreen jump scare pop in the screen.

Just click at the center of the screen again to restart the game. Your highscore will be automatically saved after each round.
